endpoints.name: Create Draft Email
endpoints.description: Create a new draft email message. The draft is saved but NOT sent. Use mail_draft_update to modify it later or delete it with mail_draft_delete.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Email subject line

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Email body as an object with contentType and content. Example: {"contentType": "HTML", "content": "

Hello

"} or {"contentType": "Text", "content": "Hello"}

parameters.name: toRecipients
parameters.description: Array of To recipients. Example: [{"emailAddress": {"address": "user@example.com", "name": "User Name"}}]

parameters.name: ccRecipients
parameters.description: Array of CC recipients. Example: [{"emailAddress": {"address": "user@example.com", "name": "User Name"}}]

parameters.name: bccRecipients
parameters.description: Array of BCC recipients. Example: [{"emailAddress": {"address": "user@example.com", "name": "User Name"}}]

parameters.name: importance
parameters.description: Message importance level

endpoints.name: Create Draft Reply
endpoints.description: Create a draft reply to an existing message. The draft is saved but NOT sent. Returns the new draft message which can be further modified with mail_draft_update.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The message ID of the message to reply to

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Optional comment to include in the reply body

endpoints.name: Create Draft Reply All
endpoints.description: Create a draft reply-all to an existing message. The draft is saved but NOT sent. Returns the new draft message which can be further modified with mail_draft_update.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The message ID of the message to reply all to

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Optional comment to include in the reply body

endpoints.name: Create Draft Forward
endpoints.description: Create a draft forward of an existing message. The draft is saved but NOT sent. Returns the new draft message which can be further modified with mail_draft_update.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The message ID of the message to forward

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Optional comment to include in the forwarded message body

parameters.name: toRecipients
parameters.description: Array of recipients to forward to. Example: [{"emailAddress": {"address": "user@example.com", "name": "User Name"}}]

endpoints.name: Update Draft Email
endpoints.description: Update an existing draft email message. Only provide the fields you want to change. The draft is saved but NOT sent.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The message ID of the draft to update

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Updated email subject line

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Updated email body as an object with contentType and content. Example: {"contentType": "HTML", "content": "

Updated

"} or {"contentType": "Text", "content": "Updated"}

parameters.name: toRecipients
parameters.description: Updated array of To recipients. Example: [{"emailAddress": {"address": "user@example.com", "name": "User Name"}}]

parameters.name: ccRecipients
parameters.description: Updated array of CC recipients. Example: [{"emailAddress": {"address": "user@example.com", "name": "User Name"}}]

parameters.name: bccRecipients
parameters.description: Updated array of BCC recipients. Example: [{"emailAddress": {"address": "user@example.com", "name": "User Name"}}]

parameters.name: importance
parameters.description: Updated message importance level

endpoints.name: Delete Draft Email
endpoints.description: Permanently delete a draft email message. This action cannot be undone.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The message ID of the draft to delete
